data.name: Modern Scrollbar - Notion
data.description:
Replaces the ugly Notion scrollbar for a modern and clean one, specially the horizontal on "inline databases".
It works for white and dark mode and only in webkit browsers like Safari and Google Chrome.

data.name: Mozilla Developer Network - Dark Theme
data.description:
A dark theme for the MDN web docs pages (developer.mozilla.org).  Colors are adjustable via the variables set on :root.

Style was derived from #139747.  Updated for better compatibility with the new React layout.

Any issues?  Additional websites to add?  Want to check out my other dark theme styles?  Let me know by contacting me through my social media (and please provide a screenshot if possible): https://www.queengoob.org/darkthemes
